name: Throwctopus
description:
Welcome to my second game: Throwctopus, a game where you throw octopuses! Doesn't that sound fun?

It's my submission for the weekly game jam - week 172, theme: Catapult.

This time around the rules are simple, just drag the octopus in the bubble and catapult it.  You'll have to defeat every shark in a level to progress!
